data.name: Dungeon Defenders II - The Hero Army Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Hero Army pack is here! Now you can complete your roster with an incredible collection of our newest playable Heroes and our most popular high-end Costumes (and the Farmboy Apprentice, just because) in one mega-package!

The Hero Army Pack includes:

New Heroes:
  • The Abyss Lord
  • Series EV2
  • 4 Hero Cards

Abyss Lord Costumes:
  • The Molten Master
  • Depth Lord

Series EV2 Costumes:
  • EV2-Mantis Striker

Apprentice Costumes:
  • Dark Arts Apprentice
  • Magma Mage
  • Reaper of Future Winters (RETIRED)
  • Farmboy Apprentice

Squire Costumes:
  • Ebonfire Warlord
  • Valhalla Knight Squire
  • Skeleton Squire (RETIRED)

Huntress Costumes:
  • Red Riding Huntress
  • SteamPunktress
  • Nymph of Yesteryear (RETIRED)

Monk Costumes:
  • Shinobi Infiltrator
  • Galaxy Monk
  • Skeleton Monk (RETIRED)

Note: This pack’s total value is $204 USD. All items will be delivered to your mailbox in game upon purchase. If you already own a costume or hero in this pack, you will not receive a duplicate. Both new heroes come with their own, separate hero cards.

The Hero Army pack is here! Now you can complete your roster with an incredible collection of our newest playable Heroes and our most popular high-end Costumes (and the Farmboy Apprentice, just because) in one mega-package!

The Hero Army Pack includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
